name: Cloudfarer
description:
Concept

In a celestial archipelago of broken ruins and forgotten lore, the feline wizard Pah'Tün seeks to vanquish the echoes of corrupted gods.

Sail your flying ship across a sea of clouds, brave the wind and face the storm-lord Pröh in his Temple-Grove !

Team

This game is a  small school project made by a group of game developpement students from France !

Design : Rapounet, Zennatime, Whismirk

Programming : Tsem, Azcat

Art : Glauris, Givraline

Music : Carach

Controls

The game necessitates a VR headset. It was developped and tested using an Occulus Quest.

You can grab and move the helm of the ship to rotate it.

Spells

You have multiple spells at your disposition. Each of your hands can hold a single active spell at a time. You're able to change spells by grabbing and breaking the corresponding crystals in front of you.

The Rock spell allows you to send projectiles to damage ennemies. You can hold the button to charge a more powerful attack.

The Wind spell allows you to "fill" your ship's sail with magical energy, making it move forward.

The Telekinesis spell allows you to grab some objects. You can than then propel the object forward by releasing the button.

The red crystal acts as an emergency button to stop and immobilize your ship.
